objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver Craftsmanship
• Elegant Pink Drop Design
• Perfect Gift for Her
• 6 Month Warranty Included

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

banner_details:
This elegant banner features a square layout divided into four soft pastel sections, with a subtle grid and curved stroke overlays enhancing its structure. The banner prominently displays a central product image of rose gold earrings (id: `product_image`) on the upper-right quadrant, juxtaposed with key text content on the left. The bold heading texts (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) introduce the product name using a large, modern typeface in rose tones. Supporting texts, including a refined subheading (`subheading`), feature highlight (`tagline`), product description (`description`), and brand slogan (`slogan`), all styled with harmonious fonts. A strong call-to-action button (`cta`, `cta_button`) and price highlight (`price`) make the offer compelling.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Peach: `#FDF5F5`  
- Blush Pink: `#FFEEF2`  
- Rose Blush: `#F9D7D9`  
- Coral Pink: `#F4BEB6`  
- Deep Rose: `#D06D75`  
- Wine Red: `#9D5155`  
- Mahogany: `#7B4244`  
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant floral-inspired earrings, blending soft pastel pink (#F9A8A8) with shimmering white (#FFFFFF) and crystal-clear diamond tones (#EAEAEA). The metallic rose gold base (#EAAFB2) enhances the feminine appeal, forming a circular arrangement of marquise and round-shaped stones. The pink enamel petals are softly offset by delicate prong settings, creating a subtle contrast that highlights each gem. The white and clear stones are strategically placed to catch the light and emphasize brilliance, while the rose gold seamlessly blends the components. For an advertisement banner, use a palette of blush pink, rose gold, crisp white, and soft silver hues.
